data.body: This is the first test message. Don't think too much about it.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin tincidunt, nisl rutrum lacinia laoreet, magna risus commodo lacus, eu porttitor urna purus ac nunc. In sit amet arcu nec sapien placerat sollicitudin ac vitae neque. Integer vitae sagittis nunc. Vivamus quis dolor tempor, commodo mauris non, condimentum felis. Aliquam erat volutpat. Nulla congue cursus mauris non pharetra. Integer ornare urna quis orci molestie, id dictum lectus ornare. Sed at massa arcu. Mauris malesuada fermentum lobortis. Nunc interdum suscipit purus a ornare. Mauris viverra leo a imperdiet mollis. Nam interdum elit a neque pulvinar, tincidunt egestas tortor condimentum. Duis nunc mi, aliquet nec luctus ac, tristique id orci.

With love from,
Admin
I sent you an empty letter cuz I'm an ahole. Lets hope it breaks everything!

data.optional_recipient:
To the jerk Jotain
In Hell
data.body:
Dear Jotain, you are indeed an ahole. But unlucky for you the empty letter didn't break anything. Tough luck!

Try again and I won't be so nice. (don't try again)

Yours,
Admin

Dear Admin,

Thank you for using me as a tester. I love it. I do feel used but I guess thats the life of a tester, right? Or maybe I should sue you for a lot of money. I'll think about it.

Cya later,
With love, Jotain

Hello Jotain, just letting you know you sent the previous letter TWICE! Only send letters once next time, thanks.

(Don't let it happen again, I'm serious!)

Yours,
Admin
Okay just another test. Compile time seems slow for some reason? is that really the delay? Lets see.
